text: Mary Margaret "Marg" Helgenberger (November 16, 1958) is an American actress. She acts in both television programs and movies. She has won the People's Choice, Emmy and Screen Actors Guild Awards. Helgenberger is best known for her action on the TV series CSI. She was born in Fremont, Nebraska. ==References== Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Nebraska Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners Category:People's Choice Award winners
title: Marg Helgenberger
